attributes.name: KeywordComplete
attributes.description: Input/Textarea wrapping component that adds listeners for keyboard interaction and yields data.

fields.name: active
fields.description: Flag that represents whether the item is active.

fields.name: minQueryLength
fields.description: Minimum query length before suggestion loading is triggered. This values can be overwritten on a per data-source basis, by setting minQueryLength for a data source.

fields.name: dataSources
fields.description: Object that represents all available data sources for the keyword completion. The datasource value object must contain a method to extract a string from a given suggestion. This extractDataString(suggestion) will be used once an suggestion was chosen to be used. In addition a loadSuggestion(query) must be present that returns a promise that resolves an array of suggestion for the passed query string. An additional component property can be set that is later used in the keyword-complete-tooltip-item if the component is not in block form.

tags.name: example

fields.name: text
fields.description: Autocompletion target text (usually same value as the target value).

fields.name: target
fields.description: Target element selector (Should select an input or textarea).

fields.name: breakOnSpaces
fields.description: In order to break control whether the component breaks on spaces simply set the breakOnSpaces property to false. Great for Facebook tags.

fields.name: enabled
fields.description: Whether the completion is enabled or disabled.

fields.name: shouldShowTypingState
fields.description: Wether the completion should have a typing state

fields.name: filterQuery
fields.description: Computed property that represents the current keyword suggestion query.

fields.name: keyItemComponent
fields.description: Component name for the currently active datasource

fields.name: tooltipVisible
fields.description: Computed property that represents whether the completion suggestion tooltip should be visible

fields.name: tooltipVisible
fields.description: Function to close the completion suggestion tooltip
